E  21  
IMPLEMENTING THE WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST
1        Engage 
Using the WHO Safe Childbirth Checklist successfully for every delivery leads to safer and 
better care for mothers and newborns.  However, you can only achieve such consistent 
Checklist use if birth attendants and health-care leaders believe in and actively support  
implementation of the WHO Safe Childbirth Checklist.
